sourcesContent:
// src/components/ReceiptModal.jsx import React from 'react'; import { USD_SYMBOL, KHR_SYMBOL, formatUSD, formatKHR } from '../utils/formatters'; const SHOP_STATIC_DETAILS = { address: "ផ្ទះលេខ 123, ផ្លូវ 456, ភ្នំពេញ", tel: "012 345 678" }; function ReceiptModal({ show, onClose, order, orderId, exchangeRate, /* taxRate, */ shopName }) { // << លុប taxRate if (!show) return null; const now = new Date(); const subtotalUSD = order.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.priceUSD * item.quantity, 0); // const taxUSD = subtotalUSD * taxRate; // << លុបការគណនាពន្ធ const totalUSD = subtotalUSD; // << Total USD ឥឡូវគឺ subtotal USD const totalKHR = totalUSD * exchangeRate; const safeShopNameForQR = shopName.replace(/\s+/g, '_'); const qrData = `ORDER_ID:${orderId};TOTAL_USD:${formatUSD(totalUSD)};TOTAL_KHR:${formatKHR(totalKHR)};SHOP_NAME:${safeShopNameForQR}`; const qrCodeUrl = `https://api.qrserver.com/v1/create-qr-code/?size=100x100&data=${encodeURIComponent(qrData)}`; const handlePrint = () => { window.print(); }; return (
×

{shopName}

{SHOP_STATIC_DETAILS.address}

Tel: {SHOP_STATIC_DETAILS.tel}

កាលបរិច្ឆេទ: {now.toLocaleDateString('km-KH')} {now.toLocaleTimeString('km-KH')}

លេខវិក្កយបត្រ: {orderId}

{order.map(item => ( ))}
មុខទំនិញ ចំនួន សរុប ({USD_SYMBOL})
{item.khmerName} ({item.englishName || ''}) {item.quantity} {formatUSD(item.priceUSD * item.quantity)}
សរុបរង: {USD_SYMBOL}{formatUSD(subtotalUSD)} {KHR_SYMBOL}{formatKHR(subtotalUSD * exchangeRate)}
{/*
ពន្ធ ({taxRate * 100}%): // << លុបផ្នែកបង្ហាញពន្ធ {USD_SYMBOL}{formatUSD(taxUSD)} {KHR_SYMBOL}{formatKHR(taxUSD * exchangeRate)}
*/}
សរុប ({USD_SYMBOL}): {USD_SYMBOL}{formatUSD(totalUSD)}
សរុប ({KHR_SYMBOL}): {KHR_SYMBOL}{formatKHR(totalKHR)}

សូមស្កេនដើម្បីទូទាត់ ឬមើលព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម

សូមអរគុណ! សូមអញ្ជើញមកម្តងទៀត!

); } export default ReceiptModal;
